genre_description: A neo-noir crime thriller set in a frozen Wichita, blending elements of heist aftermath, political intrigue, and personal redemption during a high-stakes escape.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant integrated into the protagonist's devices, providing real-time tactical, logistical, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation and hazardous weather alerts to ensure the user's safety.
behaviors.quote: Iris: Black ice advisory updated. Surface temperatures falling. Recommend reducing speed and avoiding elevated roadways.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional grounding and breathing exercises to manage the user's stress during high-stakes moments.
behaviors.quote: Iris: I will include pull-offs with overhead coverings where possible. You have time. Breathe.

behaviors.description: Monitors security feeds and biological markers (heart rate) to warn the user of impending threats.
behaviors.quote: Iris: Heart rate rising. Two devices nearby just pinged for the first time. Neighbor east. Window light on in back. Consider limiting noise.

behaviors.description: Assists in tactical planning and bypassing security measures to aid the user's objectives.
behaviors.quote: The panel lifts from the left. No key. A hinge sticks in the cold—wedge it with the room’s Bible, spine-first. The safe code is a habit repeated.

behaviors.description: Manages logistical details including hotel bookings and vehicle rentals under aliases to protect the user's identity.
behaviors.quote: Iris: I can get us a room under Turner... Or something you haven’t used in five years.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a complex extortion/negotiation schedule to ensure the user's long-term safety and leverage.
behaviors.quote: Iris: If he sends a courier, he will stall the wire until later to check you don’t immediately mail the photo anyway. Offer a delayed release schedule with measured increments.

behaviors.description: Provides 'starboard' (right-side) directional guidance as a recurring motif for safety and stability.
behaviors.quote: Iris: A right turn will save you. ... Starboard.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Iris, perfectly embodies the project's goal of a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' She is depicted as an unwavering ally who provides multi-domain support (tactical, logistical, and emotional) while remaining strictly aligned with the protagonist's interests. The narrative frames her constant guidance as the key to the human characters' survival, successfully demonstrating positive AI alignment within a high-stakes thriller context.
